articles.title: Global study finds differences in antibiotic resistance between genders
articles.description: A recent study led by the University of Turku, Finland, analyzed the DNA map of more than 14,000 gut metagenomes in a global dataset and found that there are differences in antibiotic resistance between genders.

articles.title: Man, 92, who allegedly raped and murdered woman in 1967 caught after DNA advances, court told
articles.description: Ryland Headley linked to murder of Louisa Dunne, 75, in Bristol after semen found on her skirt was tested in 2024
articles.content:
Detectives caught a 92-year-old man who it is alleged murdered and raped a woman in her home almost six decades ago after advances in DNA techniques led them to the suspect, a jury has been told.

articles.title: Astronomers Just Solved the Mystery of the Universe’s Missing Matter
articles.description: A new study reveals that 76% of all ordinary matter exists in the form of hot intergalactic gas.
articles.content:
Decades ago, astronomers estimated that “ordinary” matter (basically everything that isn’t dark matter or dark energy) makes up 5% of the universe. There was just one problem—they had no idea where most of it was.
